title: क्या जामिया शूटर की सीबीएसई मार्कशीट प्रामाणिक है?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Here's something interesting about #RambhaktGopal's Jewar Public School. The school, though affiliated with CBSe, doesn't have any students enrolled in class IX and X. They also do not have any section as per CBSE website. How did @ANI obtain the marksheet? pic.twitter.com/hv0DOuACLQ
